content.en: Multi-cue 3D tracking: Researchers are exploring ways to improve 3D face tracking from a single camera view by integrating multiple visual cues. They are also developing hybrid approaches to enhance the performance of pose estimation methods for camera tracking in real-time augmented reality applications. Additionally, algorithms based on depth sensors and wearable cameras are being proposed to achieve robust hand and head tracking.
content.da: Multikue 3D-sporing: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre 3D-ansigtssporing fra et enkelt kameraudsyn ved at integrere flere visuelle spor. De udvikler også hybride tilgange for at forbedre ydeevnen af poseestimeringsmetoder til kameraskridtning i realtids augmented reality-applikationer. Desuden foreslås algoritmer baseret på dybdesensorer og bærbare kameraer for at opnå robust hånd- og hovedsporing.
